question: Who among the following was the Premier of Madras Presidency at the time of Indiaâ€™s Independence?
explanation: O. P. Ramaswamy Reddiyar, also known as Omandur Ramasamy Reddy was the Premier of Madras Presidency from 23 March 1947 to 6 April 1949. After that Kumaraswamy Raja served as the Chief Minister of Madras.
